name: Unity Park
address: Grand Palace, Gulele, Addis Ababa, Ethiopia
description: Unity Park showcases Ethiopia’s rich heritage, with restored royal compounds, wildlife enclosures, and cultural exhibitions.

name: National Museum
address: King George VI St, Addis Ababa Ethiopia
description: Home of the famous fossil ‘Lucy,’ this museum exhibits artifacts spanning Ethiopia’s ancient and modern history.

name: Meskel Square
address: Meskel Square, Kirkos, Addis Ababa Ethiopia
description: A central gathering spot for major celebrations and festival, Meskel Square is a cultural and social heart of the city.

name: Entoto Natural Park
address: Entoto Hills Entoto, Addis Ababa Ethiopia
description: Escape the city with hiking trails, panoramic views, and clean air in this vast ecological park on Entoto Hills.

name: Martyrs Memorial
description: A somber yet educational museum remembering victims of the Derg regime, promoting peace and remembrance.

name: Addis Mercato
description: One of Africa’s largest open-air markets, offering everything from spices and textiles to crafts and electronics.

name: Holy Trinity Cathedral
description: A majestic Ethiopian Orthodox cathedral and the burial place of Emperor Haile Selassie, Ras Tafari Makonnen.

name: Friendship Park
description: A lush, urban park ideal for family outings, hosting fountains, flowers, and leisure paths, lake with fishing ground.
